content.rendered:
TrailMax Roof Rack System to suit Toyota LC200 11/2015+ Series

 

Our TrailMax roof rack system to suit the Toyota LC200 is like no other. Our design is tough, aggressive and yet follows the vehicle’s original lines and profile. It’s streamline and yet fully practical for mounting anything for your next job or adventure.

Best of all is the compatibility for our 32” HD Combat light bar in the front. Our HD LED light bar will fit flush meaning it won’t interfere with the mounting of anything overhanging the front of the rack. Our roof rack system also includes the option to install our slimline 20” LED light bar in the rear.

Our design is also much more streamlined than most allowing for less wind resistance, better economy and less wind noise.

Our TrailMax roof rack system is designed to be versatile and many accessories from other racks are able to be mounted directly to our TrailMax system. This means you can swap over to our roof rack system on your new car and still use all the mounting accessories you may have purchased for other brand racks.

 

  • Load capacity – Dynamic up to 150kg*, Static 360kg
  • Made from zinc coated and then powder coated mild steel and powder coated Aluminium side.
  • Custom “No Drill” mounting brackets to save install time
  • Includes 2 x Tie down straps.
  • Fully Compatible with our 32″ HD Combat light in front (includes brackets)
  • Fully Compatible with our 20” Slimline light in rear (includes brackets)

(wiring harness not included)

*Subject to vehicle manufactures load limits

excerpt.rendered:
Trailmax Roof Rack System – LC200 11/2015+

 

If “OUT  OF  STOCK” please enquire.
